snippet.title: Terminus: Zombie Survivors - One Year of Early Access
snippet.description:
It's been a year since I released Terminus on Steam. Thanks to everyone who joined Early Access, Terminus has improved significantly over the past year. Thank you so much for helping shape the game. Please look forward to future updates as well!

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534980?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=TerminusChannel&utm_content=2&utm_term=EN
Steam News: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1534980/view/6162616317330234984

#Terminus #TurnBased #Survival #Roguelike 


터미너스: 좀비 생존자들을 스팀에 출시한 지 1년이 지났습니다. 앞서 해보기에 함께해주신 여러분 덕분에 1년 동안 터미너스가 많이 발전할 수 있었습니다. 게임을 만드는 데 도움을 주셔서 진심으로 감사드립니다. 앞으로의 업데이트도 기대해주세요!

스팀 페이지: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1534980?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=TerminusChannel&utm_content=2&utm_term=EN
스팀 뉴스: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1534980/view/6162616317330234984

#터미너스 #턴제 #생존 #로그라이크
